tutorial: 3. Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Two consecutive closes means that the current and the previous candle close below the lower band!

paragraphs.text:
To describe the close of the previous candle, we need to use the previous property to modify each property of each indicator used on both sides of the statement:
chart.at01hs.candle.previous.close < chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.
previous.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.
previous.deviation

Create a new condition under the same situation and use the code above! Before you do that, notice that I introduced a couple of breaks in the statements after bollingerBand. just to have them fit the screen. You must remove them so that they don't cause trouble!
